bioAsHtml: Jennifer "Jenn" Strater is Senior Consultant at Object Partners, Inc and Co-Founder of Gr8Ladies, an organization for the support women in the Gr8 community. She is an active participant in the Gr8 community and regularly attends her local user group, GroovyMN. Jenn also presents introductory interactive sessions at various tech events in the United States including as part of the Gr8Workshops initiative and at international Groovy related conferences including Greach, Gr8Conf Europe, and Gr8Conf US.

acceptedTalks.title: Creating RESTful Web Services with Grails 3
